sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to our Question Generator app Qus-Ai. By using our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before proceeding.

sections.title: Account Registration
sections.content: To access certain features, you must register an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities conducted under your account.

sections.title: Usage of Services
sections.content: Our app allows you to generate questions from topics or PDF files. You agree to use the services responsibly and not for any unlawful or unauthorized purposes.

sections.title: Payment and Tokens
sections.content: Our service operates on a token-based system. Generating questions from a topic costs 1 token, while extracting questions from a PDF costs 5 tokens. All purchases are non-refundable.

sections.title: Prohibited Activities
sections.content: You agree not to misuse the platform, including attempting to hack, or exploit the services or content for unauthorized purposes.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content generated by the app is for personal use only. You may not redistribute, sell, or commercially exploit the content without prior permission.

sections.title: Privacy Policy
sections.content: Your data is handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference.

sections.title: Termination
sections.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the app if you violate these Terms and Conditions.

sections.title: Changes to Terms
sections.content: We may update these Terms and Conditions from time to time. Continued use of the app after such changes indicates your acceptance of the revised terms.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at debrajbanshi1@gmail.com.
